recommendations.title: Ensure brand color consistency
recommendations.description: Non-brand colors detected that may not align with Summit Chronicles design system.
actionItems: Review CSS custom properties in globals.css
Replace hardcoded colors with Tailwind brand classes
Use alpineBlue, summitGold, and other defined brand colors
